enb_long_title: Twenty-Fourth sessions of the Subsidiary Body for Scientific and Technological Advice (SBSTA) and the Subsidiary Body for Implementation (SBI) of the UNFCCC and First session of the Ad Hoc Working Group on Further Commitments for Annex I Parties under the Kyoto Protocol (AWG) and related meetings
sentences: During informal consultations, delegates continued to work through the initial list of activities identified at the Vienna workshop with a view to simplifying the list.

They addressed: methods and tools; data and observation; climate modeling; climate related risks and extreme events; socioeconomic information, adaptation planning and practices; research; technologies for adaptation; and economic diversification.
The G-77/CHINA made several proposals to add some recommendations to the list of deliverables on how to address the issues and on practical implementation.
The Co-Chairs will prepare new text incorporating the various comments in time for a contact group meeting on Monday morning.
